title: Little Women: Atlanta: Monie Gets Married
overview: In Little Women: Atlanta: Monie Gets Married, "Little Women: Atlanta" cast member Tiffany â€˜Monie' Cashette enters the spotlight in this series that takes a look at the ongoing preparations for a big day in her life. After getting engaged to Morlin, Monie is excited to plan for her fantasy wedding. As is typical with reality shows, though, things don't go as planned and issues arise. Things start to get derailed when she confronts the gang and discusses the plans for her bridal party. A family conflict further complicates things, jeopardizing Monie's dream of having her stepfather walk her down the aisle.The wedding itself gets called into question when an emergency phone call comes in from the wedding planner, alerting everyone that Morlin is missing from his bachelor party.
